testcase.name: Login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: When User enters valid email address........................................passed And Enter valid password....................................................passed And Click password field eye icon...........................................passed And Clicks on Sign in button................................................passed Then User should login successfully.........................................passed Then Al-Arabia dashboard should display successfully........................passed

testcase.name: Login with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: When User enters invalid email address......................................passed And Enter invalid password..................................................passed And Click password field eye icon...........................................passed Then User should get a invalid email and password error message.............passed

testcase.name: Login with valid email address and invalid password
testcase.system-out: When User enters valid email address........................................passed And Enter invalid password Password.........................................passed And Click password field eye icon...........................................passed Then User should get must contain one number error message..................passed

testcase.name: Login with invalid email address and valid password
testcase.system-out: When User enters invalid email address......................................passed And Enter valid password....................................................passed And Click password field eye icon...........................................passed Then User should get a invalid email and password error message.............passed

testcase.name: Login with valid email address and invalid password without special character
testcase.system-out: When User enters valid email address........................................passed And Enter invalid password without special character........................passed And Click password field eye icon...........................................passed Then User should get must contain one special case character error message..passed

testcase.name: Login with valid email address and invalid password without special character
testcase.system-out: When User enters valid email address........................................passed And Enter invalid password without uppercase char...........................passed And Click password field eye icon...........................................passed Then User should get must contain one upper case character error message....passed

testcase.name: Login with valid email address and invalid password with short character
testcase.system-out: When User enters valid email address........................................passed And Enter invalid password with short char..................................passed And Click password field eye icon...........................................passed Then User should get password is too short error message....................passed

testcase.name: Login without email address and password
testcase.system-out: When Click email field......................................................passed And Click password field....................................................passed Then User should get required error message.................................passed

testcase.name: Reset password on forgetting it
testcase.system-out: When User clicks forgot password option.....................................passed And User enters forgot password valid email address.........................passed And User clicks Send Reset link button......................................passed Then Proper confirmation email message should receive to user mail..........passed

testcase.name: Forgot password with invalid email address
testcase.system-out: When User clicks forgot password option.....................................passed And User enters forgot password invalid email address.......................passed Then User should get a invalid email address error message in forgotpassword page.passed

testcase.name: Forgot password without email address
testcase.system-out: When User clicks forgot password option.....................................passed And User enters forgot password invalid email address and delete............passed Then User should get a email address or phone number is required error message.passed

testcase.name: Check members dashboard page
testcase.system-out: Given Admin logged in with valid credentials................................passed When Al-Arabia overall dashboard should display.............................passed And User clicks the members module..........................................passed Then Al-Arabia members dashboard should display successfully................passed

testcase.name: Invite the member with valid inputs
testcase.system-out: Given Admin logged in with valid credentials................................passed When Al-Arabia overall dashboard should display.............................passed And User clicks the members module..........................................passed And User clicks the invite member button....................................passed And User enters the email or phone number...................................passed And User selects the role manager...........................................passed And User selects the department electrical..................................passed Then The invitation should sent to user given mail address successfully.....passed
